name: Poltergeist Investigation
description:
A short game I made for the Haunted PS1 Summer Spooks Jam.

The game is complete, it's just a short project about being in a house that has a Poltergeist event happening in it. The events become more agitated the longer you stay in the house.

I used a lot of different things on this project to get more acquainted with the engine, criticism is more than welcome!
